This seems to be due to the fact that most of the rest of the J2EE projects
expect jdk1.4
JDK 1.5 is targeted for v1.5 of WTP
changing target from 1.5 M1 to 1.5 M5 to reflect new numbering system as we join Collisto.
This is related to JDK5 support not specific to EJBs.  Therefore invalid
